testsuite.name: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: When I choose creating new assignment in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: Then Assignment Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: When enter Assignment name "Formula Entry Mode Assignment"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: And I click on the questions tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: And I click the new question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: And I create question "Eqe Entry Mode" with label "Eqe Entry Mode Label"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: And I create a Mathematical Formula response area in the assignment question editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: And I save & close the new question in the assignment editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: Then verify the question caption text is "Eqe Entry Mode Label"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: When I choose to create a new question from the Add dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: And I create question "Text Entry Mode" with label "Text Entry Mode Label"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: And I create a Mathematical Formula response area in the assignment question editor with the sub-type set to "Ordered lists of formulas - e.g. 2x^3, 4x"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: And I save & close the new question in the assignment editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: Then verify the question caption text is "Text Entry Mode Label"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: When I save & close the assignment on the questions page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: When I save and close the assignment summary details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: Then the new assignment "Formula Entry Mode Assignment" is visible in its own expanded column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: And I launch the "Formula Entry Mode Assignment" assignment in "Student Readiness" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: When I change the Mathematical Formula entry mode to Equation Editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: Then I assert true that the Mathematical Formula entry mode is Equation Editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: When I use "Question Menu" button to navigate to "Question 2"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: Then I assert false that the Mathematical Formula entry mode is Equation Editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: When I save and quit assignment to clear assignment state
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: Then I am on the Class Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that switching math entry mode to equation editor doesn't affect text-entry-only Math Formula questions
